articles.description: The reality TV star, 24, who has just split from Adam Collard, was spotted whispering in Jacques' ear as they socialised at the GraceJacob Selfridges&Co event at Mnky Hse restaurant.
articles.content:
Paige Thorne put on a very cosy display with her Love Island ex-boyfriend Jacques O'Neill at an event in Manchester on Saturday night.

articles.title: Your TV is getting a massive free content boost! ITVX launch date confirmed - Express
articles.description: Homes across the UK will soon have a new way to watch television with ITV confirming the launch date of its new streaming service.
